channel.title: Help me my client dosen't do anything!
channel.description:
ok guys so when my client ip is set to 127.0.0.1 or localhost it works perfectly but when i change it in gui.java im on delta so when i change it its "serverip = dds-speczreborn.no-ip.biz" so when i change the ip the client dosen't even run!! it gives me this error! [code]connecting to update server java.net.UnknownHostException: dds-speczreborn.no-ip.biz at java.net.Inet6AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method) at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressFromNameService(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(Unknown Source) at Gui.<init>(Gui.java:59) at Gui.main(Gui.java:48)
C:\Users\pc\Desktop\DDS-specz REBORN Client>pause Press any key to continue . . .[/code]\ BTW:i did try it from another computer and different network it still gave me the same error

item.title: Help me my client dosen't do anything!
item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
item.description:
@own_master wrote:

ok guys so when my client ip is set to 127.0.0.1 or localhost it works perfectly but when i change it in gui.java
im on delta so when i change it its “serverip = dds-speczreborn.no-ip.biz”
so when i change the ip the client dosen’t even run!! it gives me this error!

[code]connecting to update server
java.net.UnknownHostException: dds-speczreborn.no-ip.biz
at java.net.Inet6AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method)
at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(Unknown Source)
at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressFromNameService(Unknown Source)
at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(Unknown Source)
at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source)
at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source)
at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(Unknown Source)
at Gui.(Gui.java:59)
at Gui.main(Gui.java:48)

C:\Users\pc\Desktop\DDS-specz REBORN Client>pause
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
BTW:i did try it from another computer and different network it still gave me the same error

Read full topic
item.source: Help me my client dosen't do anything!
